attr.title: LISA: The Hopeful
attr.desc: Lisa The Hopeful is a fan game set in the Lisa universe
attr.inst:
download the game from itchio, https://taco-salad.itch.io/lisa-the-hopeful tested with Windows version. Copy all assetsto the gamedata folder.

Note: This game is not ideal for devices with low resolution displays and/or absent joysticks.
